import Head from 'next/head'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Navigation from '../components/Navigation'; import NavigationFooter from '../components/NavigationFooter'; import styles from '../styles/home.module.css'; import StylesContact from '../static/StylesContact'; const Contact = () => { const handleSubmit = async event => { event.preventDefault(); const res = await fetch ( 'https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxT1I9HS2PVjAVM6wlGG1bDhROXSDifsm7mI-x0qH9U_rgwSQ0tbWTeAA/exec', { body: JSON.stringify({ honeypot: event.target.honeypot.value, name: event.target.name.value, message: event.target.message.value, email: event.target.email.value, color: event.target.color.value, }), header: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, method: 'POST' } ) const result = await res.json() } return(
Contact

We would love to hear from you!

) } export default Contact;
